basics.name: Lucas Jeremias Fassi
basics.label: Cloud & Backend Engineer | AWS Infrastructure | DevOps
basics.summary: Cloud and backend engineer with extensive experience designing, deploying, and operating AWS-based infrastructures. Hands-on with IAM, EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, CloudWatch, CodePipeline, Docker, Linux, and shell scripting. Admin-level responsibilities across multiple AWS accounts: access management, security hardening, monitoring, cost control, CI/CD automation. Background as backend developer (Node.js/TypeScript, PHP) and university lecturer. Seeking part-time, remote cloud/infrastructure roles (AWS administration, DevOps support, infrastructure maintenance, automation).

work.name: EYCON

highlights: Administer IAM users/roles/policies and multi-account access.
Configure and maintain EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, CloudWatch, CodePipeline.
Implement and maintain CI/CD pipelines (CodeCommit + CodePipeline).
Monitor systems and optimize performance; address incidents related to deployments, networking, scaling.
Collaborate on security, cost optimization, and infrastructure best practices.
